short_desc: FRMDATEB2L must not be from date before form was released
full_desc: Q0a. FRMDATEB2L (B2L form date) must not be from date before form was released (2017)

test_name: LBUDFALL compared to Form D1L LBCAFALL
short_desc: If LBUDFALL= 3 or 4 then Form D1L LBCAFALL should not equal 0
full_desc: If Q9. LBUDFALL (Falling (unrelated to freezing)) = 3 or 4 (Falls an average of once daily or more than once daily) then Form D1L Q4j. LBCAFALL (Falls) should not equal 0 (Absent)

test_name: LBUDFALL compared to Form D1L LBCAFALL
short_desc: If LBUDFALL= 0 then Form D1L LBCAFALL should not equal 2
full_desc: If Q9. LBUDFALL (Falling (unrelated to freezing)) = 0 (None) then Form D1L Q4j. LBCAFALL (Falls) should not equal 2 (Definitely present)

test_name: LBUDTREM compared to Form D1L LBCMRTRM, LBCMPTRM, and LBCMATRM
short_desc: If LBUDTREM= 3 or 4 then at least one of these Form D1L variables should equal 2: LBCMRTRM, LBCMPTRM, or LBCMATRM
full_desc: If Q12. LBUDTREM (Tremor)= 3 or 4 (Severe or marked; interferes with most activities) then at least one of these Form D1L variables should equal 2: Q2c. LBCMRTRM (resting tremor), Q2d. LBCMPTRM (postural tremor), or Q2e. LBCMATRM (action tremor)
test_logic: If LBUDTREM in (3,4) and (LBCMRTRM ne 2 and LBCMPTRM ne 2 and LBCMATRM ne 2)

test_name: LBUDTREM compared to Form D1L LBCMRTRM, LBCMPTRM, and LBCMATRM
short_desc: If LBUDTREM= 0 then all of these Form D1L variables should equal 0 or blank: LBCMRTRM, LBCMPTRM, or LBCMATRM
full_desc: If Q12. LBUDTREM (Tremor)= 0 (Absent) then all of these Form D1L variables should equal 0 or blank: Q2c. LBCMRTRM (resting tremor), Q2d. LBCMPTRM (postural tremor), or Q2e. LBCMATRM (action tremor)
test_logic: If LBUDTREM=0 and (LBCMRTRM ne (0 or blank) and LBCMPTRM ne (0 or blank) and LBCMATRM ne (0 or blank))
